details:
Joomla Site reports:

> * Secured "Remember Me" functionality against SQL injection
>   attacks
> * Secured "Related Items" module against SQL injection
>   attacks
> * Secured "Weblinks" submission against SQL injection
>   attacks
> * Secured SEF from XSS vulnerability
> * Hardened frontend submission forms against spoofing
> * Secured mosmsg from misuse
> * Hardened mosgetparam by setting variable type to integer if
>   default value is detected as numeric
> * Secured com\_messages from XSS vulnerability
> * Secured getUserStateFromRequest() from XSS vulnerability
